articles.title: Improve Communication and Code with StackOverflow

articles.description: A guide on my personal method of using StackOverflow to improve my code and communication skills by mostly answering my own questions. In this guide I explain how StackOverflow has improved my skills by expanding the way I vocalize my problems.
